comments: I was very hesitant to take a class about Gender Studies because I\'m not particularly interested in the topic, but Carin made it great. Not only does she care about women, but she cares about every person she comes across. So understanding, so helpful, and so funny. A must take at NCC.

comments: This is one of the best professors at NCC. She\'s not only hilarious and relatable, but also wonderful at explaining things and is truly an advocate for not only women, but all people. It was inspiring to have her as a Gender Studies professor.

comments: Great advisor, she coaches students and helps them to develop a professional acting career. She herself has been in Chicago theatre plays, and has her own theatre company.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: She makes me remind of Bette Midler in "For the Boys". Carin not only teaches in class but coaches students! She even guides in the business, helping to take headshots, production photos, albums, etc. I\'m still amazed that she has her own company (The Other Theatre Company) and if you\'re good you could be there eventually. Go Carin!

comments: I\'m an alum, but I\'ve had many classes with her,and really enjoyed her. She is very popular with the students because she is cool and she teaches all the classes that make you want to be in theatre, and makes them very fun. Only complaint would be she kind of plays favorites, she\'s fair in class, but outside it\'s very clear who she\'s buddies with.
